title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When following the steps in the bug report, which involve creating a new basic project and opening a file test.xml with the scripted resource editor example as the default editor, selecting 'Open With...' and choosing 'Default Text Editor' from the contextual menu does not result in any action. The scripted resource editor example remains active and the file is not opened with the new editor type. It is expected that selecting 'Default Text Editor' should open a new editor window for the file, since it is a different editor type than the current one.
EB: After selecting 'Default Text Editor' from the 'Open With...' menu, a new editor window should be opened for the selected file, using the 'Default Text Editor' as the editor type.
SR:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named test.xml.
3. With the test.xml file selected in the Navigator, right-click and choose 'Open With...' from the contextual menu.
4. From the 'Open With...' menu, select 'Default Text Editor'.
5. Verify that a new editor window opens for the test.xml file, using the 'Default Text Editor' as the editor type.
